name: The Pitch Multiple Choice Quiz | 'Seinfeld' - Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What TV station wants to launch Jerry's show?
questions.explanation:
NBC.

	Now this is a classic "Seinfeld" storyline.  In this show about nothing, the cast decides to make a show about nothing.  After receiving the news that NBC is considering a show for Jerry, he thinks it'll be difficult to make a TV show.

questions.text: When everyone is thinking of ideas for TV shows, what is not one of Jerry's occupations on his shows?
questions.explanation:
Auto mechanic.

	The teacher and antique store owner are George's ideas, and the circus manager is Kramer's idea.  Although everyone is suggesting ideas, Jerry doesn't like any of them.

questions.text: What does Kramer trade his radar detector for?
questions.explanation:
motorcycle helmet.

	Newman is trading a motorcycle helmet which he got from his girlfriend.  Jerry decides to point out to Kramer that the trade is unfair, but once Newman leaves with the detector, Kramer says it doesn't work.

questions.text: What does George say should be next to pepper and salt in a restaurant?
questions.explanation:
Salsa.

	George thinks it should be on the table because it's the #1 condiment in America.  Jerry says that the only reason people like it is because they like to say "Salsa".

questions.text: Where did George and Jerry think of the idea of 'the show about nothing'?
questions.explanation:
Monk's Restaurant.

	The conversation between the two actually emulates the original conversation between Jerry and Larry David when they decided to create the show.  Jerry decides that he likes the idea and they use it.

questions.text: Does Newman find out that the radar detector doesn't work?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	While driving down the Palisades Parkway, Newman discovers that the detector doesn't work and he wants his helmet back.  Newman gets a parking ticket for speeding.

questions.text: Who does Jerry run into in the TV studio?
questions.correct: Joe Davola & Joe & Crazy Joe Davola & Crazy Joe
questions.explanation:
Joe Davola & Joe & Crazy Joe Davola & Crazy Joe.

	Crazy Joe Davola starts is multiple episode arc with this episode and eventually he becomes Elaine's boyfriend.  Jerry doesn't like Joe because he's a total nut.

questions.text: How many executives do George and Jerry meet with in the studio?
questions.explanation:
Four.

	One of the executives is Susan, George's future fiancée on the show.  She ends up losing her job (and her life in a future season) because of George.

questions.text: Where is Elaine during the episode?
questions.explanation:
On vacation.

	Elaine is on vacation with her psychiatrist in Paris.  Crazy Joe Davola also goes to the same psychiatrist as Elaine.

questions.text: Who does Kramer throw up on?
questions.explanation:
Susan.

	George decides to go out with Susan because he doesn't meet many women and he takes her up to Jerry's apartment with good news.  Kramer ends up drinking milk two weeks past its expiration date and he throws up on Susan.
